record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.J. RES. 40

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I rise to request that my name be withdrawn as a cosponsor of H.J. Res. 40. After further reflection, I have concerns that this legislation, which would propose an amendment to the Constitution relative to equal rights for men and women, could potentially compromise my longtime stance on pro-life issues. I hope that clarifying language can be added to this bill to offer assurances to pro-life supporters that this measure would not be used to undermine Federal laws on this important matter.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Texas?
